IRS990.Desc: Connecticut Health System, Inc (CHS) is currently a dormant entity - pending dissolution.

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.ExplanationTxt: CHS is currently a dormant entity - pending dissolution.
Connecticut Health Sytem Inc. was established to provide management services for the benefit of supported organizations. CHS is currently a dormant entity - pending dissolution.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 8a
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CHS is currently a dormant entity and does not have a governing body that meets on a regular basis.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 8b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CHS is currently a dormant entity and does not have a governing body that meets on a regular basis.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Form 990 was prepared by Hartford HealthCare Corporation's Tax Department. There was no board review of this Form. CHS is currently a dormant entity - pending dissolution.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 18
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Organization's financial statements, Form 990, Form 1023 and its attachments are available upon request.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CHS is currently a dormant entity - pending dissolution.
